member.name: T:Asana.User
member.summary: The below classes represent Asana entities.

member.name: T:Asana.Client
member.summary: Asana clients represent a single connection to an Asana organisation, with all associated properties and methods.

member.name: M:Asana.Client.GetTask(System.String)
member.summary: Get a specific Asana task.
member.param: The ID of the task to retrieve.

member.name: M:Asana.Client.GetWorkspaceTasks(System.String)
member.summary: Gets all tasks in a specific workspace.
member.param: The workspace whose tasks to retrieve.
member.returns: A list of all the tasks in the supplied workspace.

member.name: M:Asana.Client.GetCurrentUser
member.summary: Get the details for the current Asana user, usually the owner of the token used.

member.name: M:Asana.Client.GetUser(System.String)
member.summary: Get the details of a specific Asana user.
member.param: The identifying user id.

member.name: M:Asana.Client.CreateTask(Asana.Task)
member.summary: Create an Asana task by uploading an Asana Task object.
member.param: The task to upload.

member.name: M:Asana.Client.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Asana client constructor
member.param: OAuth token, must be valid.

member.name: M:Asana.Client.Execute``1(Asana.AsanaRequest)
member.summary: Executes an Asana Request
member.typeparam: The Asana object type to deserialize as.
member.param: The Asana Request to execute.
member.returns: Response from Asana API deserialized as the supplied type.

member.name: M:Asana.Client.Deserialize``1(RestSharp.IRestResponse,System.String)
member.summary: Deserializes a response from the Asana API to the supplied object type.
member.param: The response from Asana API to deserialize.
Optional : specify a JSON token as the root element to deserialise from. Default for Asana is : "$.data"
member.returns: The supplied response from Asana API, deserialized as the supplied type.

member.name: M:Asana.Client.TestConnection
member.summary: Test the connection to Asana by querying the API for the current user's data.

member.name: M:Asana.Client.CheckToken(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether an OAuth token is valid
member.param: The token to check
member.returns: True if token is valid and false otherwise

member.name: M:Asana.Client.CheckId(System.String)
member.summary: Check if the supplied Id is valid. Note: does not guarantee Id is valid, only checks general format.
member.param: The id to check
member.returns: True if Id seems valid, false otherwise.

member.name: T:Asana.AsanaRequest
member.summary: Represents any request to the Asana API. Inherits from the RestSharp RestRequest class.

member.name: T:Asana.Error
member.summary: Individual error message from Asana API.

member.name: T:Asana.AsanaResponse
member.summary: Response from the Asana API.

member.name: T:Asana.Webhook
member.summary: Class represents an Incoming Webhook connection in Slack

member.name: M:Asana.Webhook.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Create a webhook for use with Slack.
member.param: The URL to send data to
The Slack channel to post to, defaults to #general
The name of the user to post as
The emoji to use as icon. Uses Slack syntax, like :ghost: or :rocket:
An URL to an image to use as the icon.

member.name: M:Asana.Webhook.CreateTask(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Post a message using webhooks
member.param: Specify a webhook object to use. If nothing is supplied, it defaults to the Client's webhook.
The text to send

member.name: T:Asana.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Asana.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Asana.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Asana.Properties.Resources.add_to_slack
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: P:Asana.Properties.Resources.slack
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.summary: Create an Asana task
member.param: The name of the task.
The description of the task.

member.name: M:Asana.Task.#ctor
member.summary: Parameterless Task constructor

member.name: M:Asana.Task.ToJSON
member.summary: Serializes the Slack message to JSON

member.name: T:Web.Request
member.summary: Utility class used to construct a web request and send it

member.name: M:Web.Request.POST(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Utility function to send a POST request to a URL using a "payload" request parameter
member.param: The string URL to send request to
The POST data to send in JSON format
member.returns: The server response as a string

member.name: T:Web.Helpers
member.summary: Utility functions that are used for validation and other auxiliary tasks

member.summary: Check the URI is valid
member.param: The URI to check
